page.title: 04EDUCATION LOCAL AREA SURVEY
page.content: {PATCHAM MIDDLE SCHOOL.}From Sepember there will be 248 pupils in this mixed school.The sports played include hockey, stoolball and swimming .Extra curricula activities offered include cycling,computing,gardening and art and craft. {MARGARET HARDY HIGH SCHOOL FOR GIRLS.} An all girls Comprehnsive with 850 on roll from September 1985.There are 38 full-time staff and 3 part timers .Options offered include Computing ,Typewriting,French,German,Child care.Sports include ice-skating,horse riding. {COLDEAN FIRST SCHOOL.}5-11 year olds. Built in the 50s to meet the needs of the surrounding estate of houses.There are 210 pupils on roll.Morning nursery education is provided for 25 children who are aged 3 years plus.A cash cafeteria system opperates.
